import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import wineTypes from "../wineTypeData"; const MenuWine = ({ handleWineSelect, selectionInfo, pairingFactor1, pairingFactor2, handleShowMeClick, }) => { return (

{wineTypes.mediumred.subtypes}

{wineTypes.rose.subtypes}

Rich White

{wineTypes.richwhite.subtypes}

Light White

{wineTypes.lightwhite.subtypes}

Sparkling

{wineTypes.sparkling.subtypes}

Sweet

{wineTypes.sweetwhite.subtypes}

Dessert

{wineTypes.dessert.subtypes}

    {selectionInfo ? selectionInfo.subtypes.map((subtype, index) => (
  • {subtype}
    • )) : ""}
{pairingFactor1 ? (

Searching for recipes containing {pairingFactor1} and {pairingFactor2}

) : ( "" )}

Show me a recipe!

); }; export default MenuWine;
